channel.title: Server auto restarter
channel.description:
hi im using voules auto restarter.bat is only one that works well it did now i got JDK 6 it dosnt work can anyone help me make it work my compiler/run is mod taharoks perfect compiler only one that would work(dont even know if thats relevant)
:) thank you for your time :)
please reply
simplyblah0@hotmail.com is my msn for if u can help

item.title: Server auto restarter
item.dc:creator: @Aurai Aurai
item.description:
@Aurai wrote:

Taharok is right, you cannot restart a server with a batch file because a batch file runs your server. It’s a complicated ordeal, but its virtually impossible. Your JDK may be located somewhere in your computer where Volue cannot find it, but Volue was made to work with all versions of JDK (as long as they’re in the right directory).

Check and make sure your JDK is located in

C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_0X\

Where X is the version of your JDK software.

Read full topic

item.title: Server auto restarter
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Batch files cannot auto restart servers. Go into antilag.java and search for this (or something similar):

999999999

Now, change that to whatever amount of milliseconds you want it to restart. Now compile and run your server. As long as you have a ‘runserver.bat’ then your auto restarter will work perfectly.

Read full topic
